pages.title: Legendary Treasures
pages.text: $(#033dfc)Legendary Treasures$() are consumables that drop an unidentified Vault Gear piece with a roll type depending on the $(#033dfc)Legendary Treasure$() type.

pages.title: Obtaining
pages.text: $(#033dfc)Legendary Treasure$() Common & Rare Variants are both craftable, while the Omega one being exclusively obtainable through $(#033dfc)Loot Goblins$() and $(#033dfc)LVL250 Treasure Chests$() .
